trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around October 26th 2007
Summary: Two lights moving west to east about as fast as a satellite or faster
divs: sighting detailsthis happened in the north parking lot at harry& david. i always take a fast look around the sky in the morning. the first thought was a airplane. it was like headlights on a car shining at an angle towards me, with one a little higher there were some clouds in the air but it was pertty much clear they were going as fast as a satellite or faster as i said think headlights on a car [ hi-beam] watched them for 5-8 min maybe longer till they went over the mountains there speed was steady no blinking lights no trail of anything behind them no up and down they just travled in a steady line west - east they looked like they were 3 mi. apart like military aircraft if one had a ruler in there hand and looked at the objects they would have been 1\2" across? i have seen similiar objects in daylight but they do not shine its more of a round haze the speed was pertty fast.[ i have seen many things over the years and this is the first time of reporting it ]there are two reasons why im doing this i would like to know what i saw? and i saw your commerical on tv also the moon was full they pasted in front at the bottm of the moon there shine dimed a little but once past they were bright again i have thought of every thing they might be then ruled it out or as sherlock holmes said after you have ruled every thing out you can think of and no matter how bazare [ufo]then thats what it is. yes i was a little excited but i did not think much of it till later when i found out that another person saw it from a differnt angle and described the same thing to me thx. henry
